mapper.select: SELECT A.delivery_code, A.address_title, A.recipient_name, A.recipient_address, A.recipient_phone_number, A.delivery_comment, A.whether_default_address, B.user_code FROM delivery_address_info A INNER JOIN delivery_address B ON A.delivery_code = B.delivery_code WHERE B.user_code = #{user_code} AND A.whether_default_address = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (user_code, goods_code, pay_approval_code, total_amount, payed_time, delivery_code) VALUES ( #{user_code}, #{goodsCode}, #{payApprovalCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryCode} )
